descriptions.title: Destruction Ritual Using Wrathful Mantras
descriptions.content:
Description

Mantra recitation.

Example Texts

  • Phur pa drag sngags kyi phrin las 
  • ‘Jam dpal gshin rje’i gshes kyi ‘phrin las la brten nas dgra bgegs sgrol ba’i las gtad drag sngags ‘bar ba’i ‘thog mda’ 
  • Mgon po nag po chen po’i drag sngags kyi them yig 
  • Drag sngags so lnga’i sham bu sngags byang
  • See also drag sngags
